snippet: The spectacular play of Knicks’ guard Jeremy Lin was so unexpected that authorized sellers of team merchandise, and even black market vendors, had none to offer.
abstract: New York Knicks fans are unable to find any official merchandise bearing the name or number of guard Jeremy Lin, whose spectacular play came so unexpectedly that basketball's marketing machine was unprepared for timely sales.

byline.contributor: Colin Moynihan and Jeffrey E. Singer contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The spectacular play of Knicks’ guard Jeremy Lin was so unexpected that authorized sellers of team merchandise, and even black market vendors, had none to offer.

headline.seo: Jeremy Lin’s Emergence Ignites Scramble to Retail His Jersey
headline.main: Add Retailers to the List of Those Who Never Saw Him Coming
headline.print_headline: Add Retailers to the List of Those Who Never Saw Him Coming
